function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Substantial funding challenges for protected and conserved areas (PCAs)","Impact":"Inadequate funding may lead to ineffective management of PCAs and failure to achieve conservation goals","Mitigation":"Seeking increased funding and investment in biodiversity conservation","Technologies":"Financial management and fundraising platforms","People":"Managers of PCAs, conservation organizations, and government bodies","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government bodies, and international funding organizations"},{"Description":"Funding gaps in the Global South for PCAs","Impact":"PCAs in the Global South face significant funding shortfalls, leading to ineffective management and conservation efforts","Mitigation":"Developing international funding initiatives and partnerships to address funding gaps","Technologies":"Financial tracking and reporting systems, international fundraising platforms","People":"Managers of PCAs, conservation organizations, and international funding organizations","Owner":"Conservation organizations, international funding organizations, and government bodies"},{"Description":"High costs of expanding the area of land and sea under protection","Impact":"The high cost may limit the expansion of PCAs, hindering global conservation efforts and biodiversity protection","Mitigation":"Advocating for increased public and private sector investment in biodiversity conservation","Technologies":"Financial forecasting and modeling tools, advocacy and fundraising platforms","People":"Conservation organizations, government bodies, and international funding organizations","Owner":"Conservation organizations, international funding organizations, and government bodies"}]}
